page.title: 04BARCOMBE GENERAL STORE.
page.content: { {A report by Darren George. { Mr.Sharp has owned Ballards for 13yrs. The shop is called Ballards because the previous owners were called Ballards.It has always been a general store since the early 1700's.Mr.Sharp employs two full time workers,three part time workers and four paper boys.The shop is open from 8.45am-1.00pm and from 2.00pm-5.30pm Mon-Fri and 8.45am-Noon on Saturday. Mr.Sharp does not think he will ever have to close down because he has survived over the worst period and sells fresh products, which is very convenient especially for the mums with young children.He also sells about 300 papers a day.Mr.Sharp enjoys running a general store because he meets lots of people.
